org.quartz.ee.ejb
Class EJBInvokerJob

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.quartz.ee.ejb.EJBInvokerJob
All Implemented Interfaces:
Job
public class EJBInvokerJob
extends java.lang.Object
implements Job

A Job that invokes a method on an EJB.

Expects the following properties to be in the JobDataMap when it executes:

  • "ejb" - the JNDI name (location) of the EJB's home interface.
  • "method" - the name of the method to invoke on the EJB.
  • "args" - an Object[] of the args to pass to the method.

Author:
Andrew Collins, James House
